alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 4:38AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO...WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half mile. This band of heavy snow is producing snow at the rate of up to 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 434 AM EST, a band of lake effect snow extended across northern Wayne, northern Cayuga into southwest Oswego county. This band will drift northward through 630 am. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Lysander, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Scriba, Volney, Palermo, Sterling, New Haven, Phoenix, Ira, Huron, Wolcott, Minetto, Sodus Point, Hannibal and Red Creek. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
